title: Refuge Animal
overview: The Refuge Animal series promises to create the event in every episode by telling the story of animals that have not been an easy life. This season, Stéphane Fallu us into the world of a shelter to live strong emotions and to understand the real work is done to save the lives of thousands of pets. Through his eyes, Stéphane we will discover a surprising and eventful reality. Between abandonment and adoption of an animal, there is a whole world to discover. Stéphane Fallu will embark on a new quest by becoming a volunteer himself and making us go backstage at a animal shelter. Animal Refuge is a unique foray into the lives of these vulnerable animals that can count on the care of employees and dedicated volunteers.
